title: Nicky Morgan announces plan to quit as MP with swipe at Parliament
text:
Nicky Morgan, the Culture Secretary, has announced she will not stand in the general election, citing the “abuse” that comes with being an MP and the impact of the job on her family.

In a letter to her Loughborough constituency association, Ms Morgan said this can “only be justified if, ultimately Parliament does what it is supposed to do - represent those we serve in all areas of policy, respect votes cast by the electorate and make decisions in the overall national interest”.

The surprise move further dwindles the number of prominent Conservatives who voted Remain in the referendum intending to seek re-election.

Wednesday also saw announcements from Amber Rudd, former Home Secretary and then...
description: Nicky Morgan, the Culture Secretary, has announced she will not stand in the general election, citing the “abuse” that comes with being an MP and the impact of the job on her family.
